tests.title: should show main page
tests.fullTitle: General Tests:  should show main page
tests.code:
chai.request(server)
.get('/')
.end(function(err, res){
res.should.have.status(200);
done();
});

passes.title: should show main page
passes.fullTitle: General Tests:  should show main page
passes.code:
chai.request(server)
.get('/')
.end(function(err, res){
res.should.have.status(200);
done();
});

tests.title: should list ALL entries on /api/entries GET
tests.fullTitle: API Tests:  should list ALL entries on /api/entries GET
tests.code:
chai.request(server)
.get('/api/entries')
.end(function(err, res){
res.should.have.status(200);
res.should.be.json;
res.body.should.be.a('Object');
res.body.should.have.property('STATUS');
res.body.should.have.property('ERROR');
res.body.should.have.property('ITEMS');
res.body.STATUS.should.equal('SUCCESS');
res.body.ERROR.should.equal('');
res.body.ITEMS.should.be.a('Array');
res.body.ITEMS[0].should.have.property('user');
res.body.ITEMS[0].should.have.property('date');
res.body.ITEMS[0].should.have.property('sum');
res.body.ITEMS[0].should.have.property('category');
res.body.ITEMS[0].should.have.property('comment');
res.body.ITEMS[0].user.should.equal('corw');
res.body.ITEMS[0].sum.should.equal(100.1);
res.body.ITEMS[0].comment.should.equal('New nice entry specially for testing reasons')
done();
});

tests.title: should get entry by ID on /api/entry/:id GET
tests.fullTitle: API Tests:  should get entry by ID on /api/entry/:id GET
tests.code:
// grabbing all entries to show the first element
chai.request(server)
.get('/api/entries')
.end(function(err, get_res) {
chai.request(server)
.get('/api/entry/' + get_res.body.ITEMS[0]._id)
.end(function(error, res){
res.should.have.status(200);
res.should.be.json;
res.body.should.be.a('Object');
res.body.should.have.property('STATUS');
res.body.should.have.property('ERROR');
res.body.should.have.property('ITEMS');
res.body.STATUS.should.equal('SUCCESS');
res.body.ERROR.should.equal('');
res.body.ITEMS.should.be.a('Array');
res.body.ITEMS[0].should.have.property('user');
res.body.ITEMS[0].should.have.property('date');
res.body.ITEMS[0].should.have.property('sum');
res.body.ITEMS[0].should.have.property('category');
res.body.ITEMS[0].should.have.property('comment');
res.body.ITEMS[0]._id.should.equal(get_res.body.ITEMS[0]._id);
res.body.ITEMS[0].user.should.equal('corw');
res.body.ITEMS[0].sum.should.equal(100.1);
res.body.ITEMS[0].comment.should.equal('New nice entry specially for testing reasons')
done();
});
});

tests.title: should post a new entry on /api/entries POST
tests.fullTitle: API Tests:  should post a new entry on /api/entries POST
tests.code:
chai.request(server)
.post('/api/entries')
.send({
user : "test",
date : new Date(),
sum : 99.99,
category : "Home",
comment : "POST request simple test"
})
.end(function(err, res) {
res.should.have.status(200);
res.should.be.json;
res.body.should.be.a('Object');
res.body.should.have.property('STATUS');
res.body.should.have.property('ERROR');
res.body.should.have.property('ITEMS');
res.body.STATUS.should.equal('SUCCESS');
res.body.ERROR.should.equal('');
res.body.ITEMS.should.be.a('Array');
res.body.ITEMS[0].should.have.property('_id');
res.body.ITEMS[0].should.have.property('user');
res.body.ITEMS[0].should.have.property('date');
res.body.ITEMS[0].should.have.property('sum');
res.body.ITEMS[0].should.have.property('category');
res.body.ITEMS[0].should.have.property('comment');
res.body.ITEMS[0].user.should.equal('test');
res.body.ITEMS[0].sum.should.equal(99.99);
res.body.ITEMS[0].comment.should.equal('POST request simple test');
done();
});

tests.title: should change an entry on /api/entry/:id PUT
tests.fullTitle: API Tests:  should change an entry on /api/entry/:id PUT
tests.code:
// grabbing all entries to show the first element
chai.request(server)
.get('/api/entries')
.end(function(err, get_res) {
chai.request(server)
.put('/api/entry/' + get_res.body.ITEMS[0]._id)
.send({
date : new Date(),
sum : 200.20,
category : "Gardening",
comment : "PUT request simple test passed"
})
.end(function(err, res) {
res.should.have.status(200);
res.should.be.json;
res.body.should.be.a('Object');
res.body.should.have.property('STATUS');
res.body.should.have.property('ERROR');
res.body.should.have.property('ITEMS');
res.body.STATUS.should.equal('SUCCESS');
res.body.ERROR.should.equal('');
res.body.ITEMS.should.be.a('Array');
res.body.ITEMS[0].should.have.property('_id');
res.body.ITEMS[0].should.have.property('user');
res.body.ITEMS[0].should.have.property('date');
res.body.ITEMS[0].should.have.property('sum');
res.body.ITEMS[0].should.have.property('category');
res.body.ITEMS[0].should.have.property('comment');
res.body.ITEMS[0]._id.should.equal(get_res.body.ITEMS[0]._id);
res.body.ITEMS[0].sum.should.equal(200.20);
res.body.ITEMS[0].category.should.equal('Gardening');
res.body.ITEMS[0].comment.should.equal('PUT request simple test passed');
done();
});
});

tests.title: should delete a SINGLE entry on /entry/<id> DELETE
tests.fullTitle: API Tests:  should delete a SINGLE entry on /entry/<id> DELETE
tests.code:
// grabbing all entries to delere first element
chai.request(server)
.get('/api/entries')
.end(function(err, get_res) {
// removing first element of the table
chai.request(server)
.delete('/api/entry/' + get_res.body.ITEMS[0]._id)
.end(function(error, res) {
res.should.have.status(200);
res.should.be.json;
res.body.should.be.a('Object');
res.body.should.have.property('STATUS');
res.body.should.have.property('ERROR');
res.body.should.have.property('ITEMS');
res.body.STATUS.should.equal('SUCCESS');
res.body.ERROR.should.equal('');
res.body.ITEMS.should.be.a('Array');
res.body.ITEMS[0].should.have.property('_id');
res.body.ITEMS[0]._id.should.equal(get_res.body.ITEMS[0]._id);
done();
});
});

res.should.have.status(200);
res.should.be.json;
res.body.should.be.a('Object');
res.body.should.have.property('STATUS');
res.body.should.have.property('ERROR');
res.body.should.have.property('ITEMS');
res.body.STATUS.should.equal('SUCCESS');
res.body.ERROR.should.equal('');
res.body.ITEMS.should.be.a('Array');
res.body.ITEMS[0].should.have.property('_id');
res.body.ITEMS[0].should.have.property('user');
res.body.ITEMS[0].should.have.property('date');
res.body.ITEMS[0].should.have.property('sum');
res.body.ITEMS[0].should.have.property('category');
res.body.ITEMS[0].should.have.property('comment');
res.body.ITEMS[0]._id.should.equal(get_res.body.ITEMS[0]._id);
res.body.ITEMS[0].sum.should.equal(200.20);
res.body.ITEMS[0].category.should.equal('Gardening');
res.body.ITEMS[0].comment.should.equal('PUT request simple test passed');
done();
});
});

allPasses.title: should delete a SINGLE entry on /entry/<id> DELETE
allPasses.fullTitle: API Tests:  should delete a SINGLE entry on /entry/<id> DELETE
allPasses.code:
// grabbing all entries to delere first element
chai.request(server)
.get('/api/entries')
.end(function(err, get_res) {
// removing first element of the table
chai.request(server)
.delete('/api/entry/' + get_res.body.ITEMS[0]._id)
.end(function(error, res) {
res.should.have.status(200);
res.should.be.json;
res.body.should.be.a('Object');
res.body.should.have.property('STATUS');
res.body.should.have.property('ERROR');
res.body.should.have.property('ITEMS');
res.body.STATUS.should.equal('SUCCESS');
res.body.ERROR.should.equal('');
res.body.ITEMS.should.be.a('Array');
res.body.ITEMS[0].should.have.property('_id');
res.body.ITEMS[0]._id.should.equal(get_res.body.ITEMS[0]._id);
done();
});
});
